# Languages
![](../images/languages.png)

All characters begin the game knowing the Common tongue, but many races know additional languages:

:::{#languages-by-race-table}
| **Race**   | **Languages Known**    |
|:-----------|:-----------------------|
| Dwarves    | Common, Dwarvish       |
| Elves      | Common, Elvish, Sylvan |
| Gnomes     | Common, Gnomish        |
| Goblins    | Common, Goblin         |
| Half-Elves | Common, Elvish         |
| Half-Orcs  | Common, Orcish         |
| Halflings  | Common                 |
| Humans     | Common                 |
:::
:::{.table-caption}
**Table:** Common Languages by Race
:::

Some classes also know additonal languages:

:::{#class-languages-table}
| **Class**    | **Bonus Languages**                                   |
|:------------|:-------------------------------------------------------|
| Clerics     | Celestial, Diabolic, or Primordial                     |
| Magic-Users | Two additional common languages and two rare languages |
| Thieves     | Thieves’ Cant                                          |
:::
:::{.table-caption}
**Table:** Class Bonus Languages
:::

## Common

Here are the most commonly know languages of the realm:

:::{#languages-table}
| **d10** | **Language** | **Who Speaks It**               |
|:-------:|:-------------|:--------------------------------|
| 1       | Dwarvish     | Dwarves                         |
| 2       | Elvish       | Elves                           |
| 3       | Giant        | Giants, ogres, trolls           |
| 4       | Gnomish      | Gnomes, Dwarves, Halflings      |
| 5       | Goblin       | Bugbears, goblins, hobgoblins   |
| 6       | Merran       | Merfolk, sahuagin, sirens       |
| 7       | Orcish       | Orcs                            |
| 8       | Reptilian    | Lizardfolk, viperians           |
| 9       | Sylvan       | Centaurs, dryads, faeries       |
| 10      | Thanian      | Minotaurs, beastmen, manticores |
:::
:::{.table-caption}
**Table:** Languages of the Realm
:::

```{ojs}
import { generalTableSelect, highlightTableRow, readMatrixFromTable } from "../custom.js"

Inputs.button(
  html`<button style="color:black;background-color:lightgray;">Roll Language (d10)</button>`,
  {
    value: "",
    reduce: () => {
      var matrix = readMatrixFromTable("#languages-table");
      var n = matrix.length;

      // Roll d10
      var idx = generalTableSelect(
        [1, 10, 0],
        Array.from({ length: n }, function(_, i) { return [i + 1, i + 1]; })
      );

      highlightTableRow("#languages-table", idx);

      // matrix row = [d10, Language, Who Speaks It]
      var row = matrix[idx - 1];
      return "You rolled " + idx + ": " + row[1] + " — spoken by " + row[2];
    }
  }
)
```
